data.title: Sony Music India
authors: Contributors to The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
data.meta_description: Template:Use Indian English Sony Music Entertainment India is the predominant record label operated by Sony in India. The company began operation in 1997, and it was the first record company in India to be 100% foreign-owned, with Sony being a Japanese corporation. Since December 2013, the...
data.meta_site_name: The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
